entry.title: FOG ADVISORY , Pilot Mound
entry.summary: Persons in or near this area should be on the lookout for adverse weather conditions and take necessary safety precautions. Issued: 07:47 AM CST Friday 20 January 2023

entry.title: Current Conditions: -7.3°C
entry.summary:
Observed at: Pilot Mound 07:00 AM CST Friday 20 January 2023
Temperature: -7.3°C
Pressure / Tendency: 102.1 kPa falling
Humidity: 97 %
Wind Chill: -12
Dewpoint: -7.7°C
Wind: WNW 11 km/h
Air Quality Health Index: N/A

entry.title: Friday: Chance of light snow. High minus 6. POP 30%
entry.summary: Mainly cloudy with 30 percent chance of light snow this morning and risk of freezing drizzle. Clearing this afternoon. Fog patches dissipating this morning. Wind becoming west 20 km/h this morning. High minus 6. Wind chill near minus 17. UV index 1 or low. Forecast issued 05:00 AM CST Friday 20 January 2023

entry.title: Friday night: A few clouds. Low minus 14.
entry.summary: A few clouds. Wind southwest 20 km/h. Low minus 14. Wind chill minus 15 this evening and minus 23 overnight. Forecast issued 05:00 AM CST Friday 20 January 2023

entry.title: Saturday: A mix of sun and cloud. High minus 7.
entry.summary: A mix of sun and cloud. Wind west 20 km/h becoming light in the afternoon. High minus 7. Wind chill minus 23 in the morning and minus 12 in the afternoon. UV index 1 or low. Forecast issued 05:00 AM CST Friday 20 January 2023
